name: Ridge Runners
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

When a 12-year-old girl goes missing, detective Rachel Willow discovers an alarming pattern in her sleepy county involving human trafficking. What starts as a simple "missing person" case ends up deep in an underground world where people are commodities and your worst fears can be realized anywhere, even in a small town.
